us.zoom.sdk

Interface InMeetingServiceListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    us.zoom.androidlib.util.IListener

    public interface InMeetingServiceListener
extends us.zoom.androidlib.util.IListener
    Zoom in-meeting service listener. Note:The callbacks will be called in meeting process.
